solution_line_template: Darcy still has to fold {total_shirts} - {folded_shirts} = <<{total_shirts}-{folded_shirts}={remaining_shirts}>>{remaining_shirts} shirts
Darcy still has to fold {total_shorts} - {folded_shorts} = <<{total_shorts}-{folded_shorts}={remaining_shorts}>>{remaining_shorts} shorts
Darcy has to fold a total of {remaining_shirts} + {remaining_shorts} = <<{remaining_shirts}+{remaining_shorts}={total_remaining_to_fold}>>{total_remaining_to_fold} pieces of clothing
